title: Pattern Theory Engine Production Deployment
description: Deploy Pattern Theory Engine to Railway alongside Platform API. Fix path dependencies and test all engine integrations. This blocks all 4 core platform tools.
deliverables: Pattern Theory Engine deployed to Railway
Health check endpoint for engine status
All 4 core tools tested and working (bridge, detector, projector, domains)
acceptance_criteria: No hardcoded paths in any file
All engine imports successful in production
All 4 endpoints return real results (not mock data)
blockers: Requires Pattern Theory Engine codebase access
notes: CRITICAL PATH: This blocks Free Beta launch. Without engine, all 4 core tools are non-functional. Priority 1.
